snippet.title: Death in the Caribbean walkthrough/longplay (Apple II - Micro-fun)
snippet.description:
Death in the Caribbean (http://www.mobygames.com/game/apple2/death-in-the-caribbean) was a graphics adventure game published by Micro-fun in 1983 for the Apple ][. The player needs to find the hidden treasure in a mysterious island in the Caribbean.

Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com
Walkthrough - www.ifarchive.org (Sheree)
